name: course-signup-backend
description: backend for course signup running on AWS Lambda
author: Florian Schaeffler

scripts.create-table-courses: aws dynamodb create-table --region eu-central-1 --table-name course-signup_courses --attribute-definitions AttributeName=_id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=_id,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --query TableDescription.TableArn --output text
scripts.create-table-students: aws dynamodb create-table --region eu-central-1 --table-name course-signup_students --attribute-definitions AttributeName=_id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=_id,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --query TableDescription.TableArn --output text
